Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Kimball.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Kimball. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
